Night gathers, and no wmy watch begins. It shall not end until my death. I shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. I shall live and die at my post. 

I am the sword in the darkness. I am the watcher on the walls. I am the fire that burns against the cold, the light that brings the dawn, the horn that wakes the sleepers, the shield that guards the realms of men. 

I pledge my life and honor the the Night's Watch, for this night and all nights to come.
